sen.j: トロッコ嵯峨駅（とろっこさがえき）は、京都府京都市右京区にある、嵯峨野観光鉄道嵯峨野観光鉄道嵯峨野観光線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Sakyou Ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Saga Torokko Station is a stop on the Saga Sight-Seeing Tram Line of Sagano Scenic Railway.
sen.cmt: 嵯峨野観光鉄道嵯峨野観光鉄道：”嵯峨野観光鉄道”がだぶっている、単純な誤りとおもわれますので、一方を削除したとして訳してあります。
sen.e: Saga Torokko Station, located in Sakyou Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Saga Sightseeing Tram Line of Sagano Scenic Railway.
Saga Torokko Station, located in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Saga Sightseeing Tram Line of Sagano Scenic Railway.
The telegraphic address for the station name is "Torosaka."
The telegraphic address for the station name is "Torosaka."
The telegraphic address for the station name is 'Torosaka.'

sen.j: 駅前には、19世紀の科学技術や芸術を展示している「19th CENTURY HALL」（19世紀ホール）があり、国鉄D51形蒸気機関車などの蒸気機関車などが展示されている。
sen.e: 19th CENTURY HALL, where steam locomotives, such as JNR steam locomotive D51 class [type D51], and other items are exhibited, is located in front of the station.
The 19th CENTURY HALL, where steam locomotives such as JNR steam locomotive D51 class (type D51) and other items are exhibited, is located in front of the station.

The 19th CENTURY HALL, which exhibits science technology and arts from the 19th century, is located in front of the station, and one can see locomotives such as JNR steam locomotive D51 class (type D51) and other items there.

sen.j: 嵯峨野観光鉄道：嵯峨野観光線
sen.e: Sagano Scenic Railway: Sagano Sight-Seeing Tram Line
Sagano Scenic Railway: Sagano Sightseeing Tram Line
Sagano Scenic Railway: Sagano Sightseeing Tram Line

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道：山陰本線（嵯峨野線）嵯峨嵐山駅
sen.e: West Japan Railway Company (JR West): Saga-Arashiyama Station on San'in Main Line (Sagano Line)

sen.j: 京福電気鉄道：京福電気鉄道嵐山本線 嵐電嵯峨駅
sen.e: Keifuku Electric Railroad Co.,Ltd.: Randen-Saga Station on the Arashiyama Main Line of Keifuku Electric Railroad Co.,Ltd.

sen.j: 単式プラットホーム1面1線の地上駅。
sen.e: The station is located on the grand level, with a single platform serving a track.
The station is located on the ground level, with a single platform serving a track.
The station is located on the ground level, with a single platform serving a track.

sen.j: 京都嵐山オルゴール館
嵐山駅 (阪急) -- 渡月橋を渡って南東方向へ。
sen.e: Arashiyamka Station (Hankyu) -- Cross Togetsu-kyo Bridge and go southeastwards
Arashiyama Station (Hankyu) -- Cross Togetsu-kyo Bridge and go southeast.
Arashiyama Station (Hankyu) -- Cross Togetsu-kyo Bridge and go southeast.
On foot, it takes about 20 minutes.
It's a walk of approximately 20 minutes.
It's a walk of approximately twenty minutes.

sen.j: 嵯峨鳥居本（重要伝統的建造物群保存地区）

sen.j: 2003年4月 駅前に19世紀ホールがオープン。
sen.e: In April of 2004, 19th CENTURY HALL opened in front of the station.
In April 2004, 19th CENTURY HALL opened in front of the station.
April, 2003: 19th CENTURY HALL opened in front of the station.
